literals.value: Basic Autocannon

The Basic Autocannon fires a high frequency stream of metal slugs at high velocities. Metal slugs are effective against armour and hull, but are plasmafied by shields. Autocannons are designed to overwhelm shields by fatiguing them.
Basic Cannon

The Basic Cannon fires a large metal slug with an explosive warhead at high velocities. Explosive warheads explode on impact, dealing 50% damage through shields. Explosives are effective against armour and hull, with 50% armour penetration.
Basic Mining Laser

The Basic Mining Laser fires a series of small laser beams and a tractor beam designed to break chunks off and collect chunks of asteroids or wrecks. Tractor beams pull impacted objects towards their source.
Basic Laser Cannon
The Basic Laser Cannon fires a single high energy laser for a short time. Lasers are effective against armour and hull, and ignore shields.
Basic Pulse Laser
The Basic Pulse Laser fires a high frequency stream of lasers. Lasers are effective against armour and hull, and ignore shields.
Basic Laser Beam
The Basic Laser Beam fires a continuous laser. Lasers are effective against armour and hull, and ignore shields.
Basic Missile

The Basic Missile fires a single missile that seeks a target. Missiles explode on impact, dealing 50% damage through shields. Explosives are effective against armour and hull, with 50% armour penetration.
Basic Torpedo
The Basic Torpedo fires a single torpedo that seeks a target. Torpedoes explode on impact, and penetrate shields. Explosives are effective against armour and hull, with 50% armour penetration.
Basic Plasma Bolter
The Basic Plasma Bolter fires a contained bolt of plasma that fatigues shields. Plasma deals 10% damage through shields. Plasma damage is dealt over time.
Basic Plasma Thrower
The Basic Plasma Thrower fires a continuous stream of plasma that fatigues shields. Plasma deals 10% damage through shields. Plasma damage is dealt over time.
